summary: A magician attempts to use the power of the Millennium Comet to awaken the legendary Pokémon Groudon.
cast: Rica Matsumoto|Veronica Taylor|Eric Stuart|Ikue Ôtani|Madeleine Blaustein|Yûji Ueda|Kaori|Rachael Lillis|Amy Birnbaum|Kyôko Yamada|Wayne Grayson|Megumi Hayashibara|Megan Hollingshead|Shin'ichirô Miki|Inuko Inuyama|Kerry Williams|Tomiko Suzuki|Chinami Nishimura|Kôichi Sakaguchi|Katsuyuki Konishi|Kenji Nojima|Natsuki Yoshihara|Miyako Ito|Ryôko Shiraishi|Takayuki Yamaguchi|Asako Shirakura|Satoshi Katôgi|Ryôkichi Takahashi|Kumiko Higa|Miwa Kôzuki|Akiko Kawase|Unshô Ishizuka|Kôichi Yamadera|Riho Makise|Papaya Suzuki|Christopher Collet|Mike Pollock|Kayzie Rogers|Tara Sands
title: Pokémon 6: Jirachi y los deseos
